title: B Site Turret + Garage Alarmbot
description: Here's a simple, yet effective Killjoy setup to cover Mid on Haven.

title: A Link Lockdown For A Site
description: This lockdown setup is useful for clearing out the entirety of A Site.

title: A Link To Graffiti Nanoswarm
description: This Nanoswarm lineup is useful for clearing players in the corner seen in the second POV.

title: A Link To Front Side Of A Default Nanoswarm
description: This nanoswarm lineup is useful for potentially stopping players from planting the Spike on the front side of Default on A Site, and even if it doesn't it has the potential to do some serious damage and open up some opportunities for your teammates to retake A Site.

title: Early Round Mid Turret from Market
description: Here's an easy combination of Killjoy's utility that allows for easier mid control.

title: Nanoswarm Lineup for B Site Pillar
description: Here's a strong molly lineup to flush Defenders out into the open, while executing the B Site. This lineup is much more effective when coordinating a split on the B Site.

title: B Main Turret Control
description: Use this simple turret to allow for easier control of B Main.

title: A Main Lockdown for Attacker
description: Here's a combination of Killjoy's utility that enables Lockdown to clear all of A Site, and a good portion of A Heaven. The turret will spot your flank and attack any Defenders from being aggressive.

title: Start Round A Main Turret
description: A simple turret that punishes Defenders for overextending.

title: Lower A Sewers Alarmbot
description: This Alarmbot setup is useful for alerting you of players lurking in, or flanking through through A Sewers.

title: A Lobby To Back A Site Post Plant Nanoswarm
description: This Nanoswarm lineup is useful for stopping players from defusing the spike behind the A Site Box. Make sure to activate the Nanoswarm as soon as possible to ensure it doesn't get destroyed as soon as it hits the ground.

title: A Lobby To Back Left Inner A Site Corner Nanoswarm
description: This Nanoswarm lineup is useful for stopping players from defusing the spike on the Back Left corner of inner A Site. Make sure to activate the Nanoswarm as soon as possible to ensure it doesn't get destroyed as soon as it hits the ground.

title: A Lobby to A Site Default Post Plant Nanoswarm
description: This nanoswarm lineup is useful for stopping players from defusing the spike on the back side of A Site, as well as making it more diffiicult to hold that area of the site, since the nanoswarm covers such a large amount of a commonly played area, which can assist your team in getting picks on players affected by the nanoswarm.

title: B Heaven Rafters Turret Setup
description: Use this powerful Killjoy turret in combination with your teammate's utility to contest for control of B Heaven.

title: Start Round Turret for B Main and B Heaven
description: An effective standard Killjoy setup that covers both B Main and B Heaven.

title: A Site Turret + Molly Combo for Defender
description: Here's a strong Killjoy setup that allows you to anchor on the A Site.

title: A Site Retake + A Heaven Control
description: Use this strong setup to prevent Attackers from rushing A Site successfully, while contesting for A Heaven Control.

title: A Tower To A Main Nanoswarm
description: This Nanoswarm lineup is useful for breaking up the Attacker's push out of A Main onto A Site, or delaying it entirely.

title: Early Round Tiles Turret
description: Place this Turret on top of the left Tiles wall to ensure any information of an aggressive push at Mid. This Turret also spots deep Top Mid, in between Defenders Spawn and Market.

title: Ascent B Site Lockdown
description: A strong combination of Killjoy's Lockdown and Turret allow for an easier take on the B Site. The ultimate ability clears all of site, except for the back right.

title: Start Round Turret For A Main
description: Here's a simple, yet effective Turret to use when looking to take A Main control.

title: Simple Mid Top Turret
description: A good Turret to plop down as soon as the barrier drops to see if anyone is pushing Mid.

title: Simple B Main Flank Turret
description: A good Turret to watch your flank and aggressors pushing B Main.

title: A Site Aggressive Nanoswarm & Turret
description: A good Nanoswarm and Turret combo that helps with your A Site execute while also having an Alarmbot watching your flank.

title: B Lobby To B Site Default Post Plant Nanoswarm
description: This nanoswarm is perfect for playing a post plant for default, throw it early and wait for a defusal sound prior to activating. Make sure to push up into B main after to insure the defusal sound is heard.

title: B Main To Market Nanoswarm
description: This nanoswarm line up is quick and easy to get someone completely off of the market door angle. Combine this with a smoke as you come out B main towards site as they will be able to see you as you cross into lane without it!

title: Front And Left Side Generator Post Plant Nanoswarm
description: This nanoswarm line up is perfect for an afterplant situation for generators, throw it prior to the defending side getting back into site. Then wait for the defusal sound before activating for an easy round win.

title: Under Rafters To Rafters Hidden Nanoswarm
description: This nanoswarm will do damage to anyone in heaven without them being able to see its position. Allowing you to deny a good amount of time before the defending side can get back into site, while you stay completely safe.

title: Tree Lockdown Retake Setup
description: Here's an extremely strong retake setup which uses your Lockdown. The combination of your Alarmbot and Mollies make it very tough for Attackers to try and harass the retake ultimate.

title: Alarmbot For Ascent A Door
description: Use this strong kill set up to punish Attackers for trying to close the door, or players attacking the site from Tree.

title: A Link Default Setup
description: A good setup to detect and protect against enemy players pushing toward A Link.

title: B Main Default Setup
description: A good setup to keep sightlines into B Main while also keeping tabs on Mid Pizza.

title: B Site Default Setup
description: A good B Site setup that also allows you to watch Mid Pizza.

title: A Site + A Link Default Setup
description: A good setup that allows you to keep tabs on Mid Pizza while watching both A Main and A Link.

title: Defender Spawn to B Main Turret
description: This turret is great to play off of when attempting to hold B Main, playing inside of Mid Market and waiting for your turret to get contact prior to peeking is an easy way to shut down B executes.

title: Attacker Spawn Turret For B Flank
description: This is a fairly common, but effective Turret for the B Flank.
